alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Mercer; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:28PM EDT until July 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Spencer County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Nelson County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Mercer County in central Kentucky... Anderson County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Washington County in central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Taylorsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bardstown, Lawrenceburg, Taylorsville, Ballard, Bloomfield, Yoder, Highgrove, Waterford, Wayside and Dugansville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Mercer; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington
